title: Circle Area Calculator MicroSim
description: Interactive visualization demonstrating the relationship between a circle's radius, area (πr²), and circumference (2πr) with real-time calculations and visual feedback. Students can adjust the radius slider to observe how area grows quadratically while circumference grows linearly.
creator: Dan McCreary
